name: A gift, “the only obligation”
description:
This is the gift, it is one of many, and will be accessible in multiple platforms over time. It’s symbol breaks down to this:

-outside square = permanence 
-inside hexagon = 6 elements, carbon
-plus sign = benefit

The present is permanent and impermanent at the same time, it is the only true obligation I feel like a person has. This is all the pieces put together to create a symbol, but there will be many different presents, many different gifts across multiple platforms. 

If you have the gift you can message me and one of these is yours 

This gift is a moment in thought. ;)
